Waiting for Network to become available…
No controller service is available on the network
No lamps have been detected on the network
Changing color temperature is not supported
Hue has no effect when saturation is at 0\u0025. Set saturation to greater than 0\u0025 to enable the hue slider
color temperature has no effect when saturation is at 100\u0025. Set saturation to less than 100\u0025 to enable the color temperature slider
the world of IoT in Elife
Make your family closer\nWelcome! Sign up and join a smart home.
We sent an email with a link to you,please check the link to continue the registration.
Please connect to another correct WiFi AP and restart app
Please input the confirm password again!!!
We will send verification to your Email
We will send a new verification tor your Email
Password must be at least 4 characters or numbers
Please select your home WiFi to connect \n with your room hub. Press the button \n below for getting start.
Please input password to connect with
Connect failed!!! Please recheck WiFi Network Name and password.
Password length is 5, 13 or 16 ASCII characters!
Password can\'t be no longer than 64 characters!
You are connecting to current home WiFi.Please make sure password is correct otherwise the following process might not be done successfully.
Please make sure WiFi network name and password are correct or the following process might not be done successfully.
If you want to use WiFi connection, press \'Yes\' to choose WiFi AP or press \'No\' to use Mobile connection.
Please login to activate this funcion. Login now?
Please receive mail from your email account
Since Android 6.0 or later have some changes on privileges, we need you to authorize the following permission to continue after your press Back
Did you delete this Room Hub?
This function can only operate on the LAN device
Seeking device, please wait a moment...
LAN device does not support this operation
This function is limited to the owner to use
Did you leave this Room Hub?
Insufficient permissions to use this function
The Room Hub is offline, you can\'t operate
The Room Hub is updating firmware, you can\'t operate
Can not find this Room Hub in LAN, to proceed to remove the Room Hub, it needs its own manual initialization Room Hub, whether to continue
The RoomHub unpaired, you can\'t operate
The RoomHub unpaired, do you want to pairing now?
Data synchronization. Please try again later!
Attention: Do not change WIFI of device when changing WIFI for Room Hub.
This Room Hub can not support this function.
Change WIFI failed! \nPlease check internet connection and password.
Scanning Room Hub may take a few seconds, please wait...
Unable to find any nearby Room Hubs
Please make sure WiFi network name and password are correct or the following process might not be done successfully.
Are you sure to terminate scan now?
Please wait for changing wifi task is done
The following process can help you change WiFi settings on Room Hub. Are you sure to continue?
The remote controller does not get the power state, please pay attention to temperature change when you control in remote.
Please click BACK again to exit
Couldn\'t find your device? Try to use
Please aim to the Room Hub with
Sorry! The Room Hub couldn\'t connect to your controller.
Please try or use Auto scan.
Do you hear the beep sound?
Press the power button on remote
Search by Brand Name, Model Name
Please do not press power button while IR is pairing
This remote controller is not be able to confirm ON/OFF state. Please notice the tempearture changes if you are using it from remote.
Press OK once all buttons work. If not, Press Next for repairing.
Press buttons in sequence then check if appliance operates correctly.
Connected to Room Hub\nPlease edit the names
Success: Rename the RoomHub\nand it is now ready to use.
You can easily to identify Room Hub by clicking it from the search result list
Search Room Hub may took a long time
There are %1$d Room Hub has been found
Please wait for the end of process...
Connect Room Hub to your home Wi-Fi [%1$s]
The whole process will be took a few minutes.Are you sure to continue?
You haven\'t finished on-boarding process.\nAre you sure you want to leave this page?
%s has registered failed. \nPlease check internet connection and add it again.
You can always connect to more Room hubs later on. You will find "Add Room Hub" from menu on Room hub main page.
The connected hub will not be affected by this procedure.
1. Please keep the hub power on, if the power is off, replug in and wait for 30 secs.

2. Before reconnecting to the hub, please make sure you find the hub that has failed to connect, if you have more than one hub listed in the previous step. (You can distinguish the hub that has connected successfully or unsuccessfully by looking from previous step)
3. While the power of the hub is still on, use a sharp object to press the reset button for more than 3 secs until the LED turns blue, then release the reset button.
4. Press the button below will start to re-add Room Hub.
You have to turn off Cellular data before you on-boarding Room Hub on the next step.
Connect Room Hub is done.\n You can continue to use WiFi or turn on Cellular data.
Please do not press power button while connecting Room Hub
* Please enter the city where the Room Hub is located.
The End time must be greater than Start time
Start time and end time must be different
Notice: These functions may not be applied to some models
Set turn off after a few hours
You do not need to add yourself to the list
Do you want to leave this %s?
Are you sure to enable BT to continue?
Check Room Hub is working well
Cannot find any Room Hub on your network environment
Check your Room Hub has been turned ON
Check to see if can connect to internet\n or restart network connection
Network connection has been switched from %1$s to %2$s
Room Hub is controlled by someone
%s temperature seems not changed after turned off
Check Room Hub is controlled by someone or not\nor doors and windows are closed.
%s Temperature is not up to expectation
Check A/C is turn ON\n or is controlled by someone
A/C is not working well\n Check doors and windows are closed
%s A/C hasn\'t been turned ON.\nIndoor and outdoor temperature have apparently difference
%s is not in your cloud device list.\nSuggest to do reset then re-bind it

When network has connection problems, A/C abnormally operations ,windows and doors are not closed or any other factors led to control failure, device will determine control is valid according to the temperature difference between the actual temperature and the set temperature .

But because of different environmental conditions in each device, you can set here if the default value does not match your environment
Did you reboot this Room Hub?
Are you sure to delete this message?
Are you sure to delete all messages?
This Room Hub can\'t be controlled\nduring updating firmware
Your device currently has the latest firmware
[%1$s] The latest firmware version is v%2$s,\ndo you want to install now?
Your device has already updated to the latest firmware version
"Update time is too long, please ignore this message if workable.\n If not, please continue to wait, Room Hub will automatically restart after completion of upgrade and then can be used normally."
This Room Hub is not available in your device list
You have to login to activate this function
This RoomHub firmware version does not support remote OTA
This type of appliances already exists
This type of appliances have reached the limit
This Room hub firmware version is too old to use this feature, please upgrade first.
Room hub allows you at home or outdoors can easily remote control home appliances
Room hub connected appliances via IR or BLE
Automatic switch appliance through scheduling lets you can feel at ease away from home
Easily share with family proximal end, a distal control appliances

You may not find any devices if skip login because current device is using Cellular network. Are you sure to continue?
You haven\'t connected to any WiFi AP. Press \'Yes\' to continue use cellular network or press \'No\' to go back then choose others AP
Your WiFi connection has no internet capability. You may not be able to use Cloud service if you press \'Yes\' to continue. Or press \'No\' to go back then choose other network.
Did you look this blood pressure record?
It will automatically open air purifier when pm2.5 detect to air quality is bad
App has a new version now.\nPlease update to the latest version then restart it.
Room Hub will receive push notifications when PM2.5 detects air quality is poor during alert period
PM2.5 battery is low, please replace new batteries
This Room Hub can not switch WiFi bridge
Enable Location Service to continue.(App might no be able to scan WiFi AP if Location Service is disabled since Android 6.0)
Yahoo !! mail users often do not receive certification letter, we recommend you to use another email
[%s] is not in registration list and also will be unable to use cloud services.We recommend you to reset Room Hub and re-add it again.Press \'Yes\' to do reset Room Hub.
Please put your blood pressure monitor closer to the Room Hub
Press power button to start using blood pressure monitor
After the measurement, please wait for 10 seconds to upload data.
See data on App then complete measurement
%s has new record, go and check now
Healthcare devices only can be added on Home LAN environment
Long press the memory button of blood pressure monitor for 3 seconds to enter pairing
Long press the connect button of pm2.5 for 1 seconds to enter pairing
Long press the Power button of air purifier for 3 seconds to enter pairing
Long press the %s memory button for 3 seconds to enter pairing
It may take a few minutes.\nPlease wait!
Recommends the user name, such as: father, mother, etc.
Install bulb on the lamp place holder
Turn the power on，the bulb will flashes once to enter pairing mode
You can easily to identify bulb by clicking it from the search result list
For convenient to use, sweety suggestion: the naming rule you can follow the spatial relations\nFor example: top of the TV, top of the table, sofa area
You can find the specific bulb by clicking the bulb icon
